sources.note: Main homepage — founded 1983 in Knoxville TN, turnkey health solutions, EHR + PM product, testimonials from long-term customers (13-15+ years)
EHR product page — feature list: patient flow, custom charts, speech recognition, note generation, prescriptions, recall/follow-ups, scanning, HL7 interfaces

PM product page — critical detail: single database shared between EHR and PM. Features: claims scrubbing, contract management, claims tracking, patient management, referrals, electronic claims, collections, line item posting, UB04 billing. Specialty modules: radiology, allergy, anesthesia, chiropractic, DME

About page — founded 1983 as medical equipment manufacturer's rep (cardiac), QRS = heartbeat wave points. Software used by providers across America for scheduling, charting, imaging, billing, patient engagement, encounter documentation
EDI page — QRS operates own clearinghouse for 15+ years, clears 2M+ claims/year. Electronic claims and electronic remittance

Insurance eligibility page — real-time verification, automated 24hr pre-appointment checks. Note: one paragraph oddly references 'Practice EHR' (different vendor's product name) — likely copy-paste web error
Payment processing — integrated merchant services posting directly to billing software and patient accounts, HIPAA compliant
Electronic statement services for outsourced printing/mailing
PARADIGM ARS — automated appointment reminders, fully integrated
Business services page — email encryption, threat protection, information archiving, secure file share, cloud backup

ONC disclosures page — links to EHI export docs, FHIR API docs, Patient API docs, RWT plans/results, privacy attestations. No mandatory_disclosures_url was provided in CHPL metadata (field was empty), but this URL serves that purpose

EHI Export Documentation (6 pages) — export via FHIR Data Portability module, ZIP format with C-CDA XML + JSON (including 'invoice history') + imported files. API at api.qrshs.com. Patient search by name, DOB, SSN

FHIR API Documentation (27 pages) — 15 FHIR resources: Patient, AllergyIntolerance, CarePlan, CareTeam, Condition, Device, DiagnosticReport, DocumentReference, Goal, Immunization, MedicationRequest, Observation, Procedure, Encounter, Provenance. API base at api.qrshs.com/fhir, read-only access

2025 Real World Testing Results — tested g(7), g(9), g(10) only per ONC enforcement discretion. Testing in sandbox/virtualized environment with 10 requests each, 100% success. Notes many clients don't regularly use Direct Messaging. Minimum 3 client practices tested
Patient portal login page — confirms portal exists, titled 'Portal - Login' with 'User Access' heading
BBB search — no results found for QRS Inc in Knoxville TN
G2 — no results found for QRS or PARADIGM EHR
Capterra — no results found for QRS PARADIGM
